languages.text: "Несовершенные машины заслуживают устранения — так же как и живые элементы, склонные к уязвимостям вроде сентиментальности".

traits.locale_text: "Несовершенные машины заслуживают устранения — так же как и живые элементы, склонные к уязвимостям вроде сентиментальности".

languages.text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
languages.original_text: "Несовершенные машины заслуживают устранения — так же как и живые элементы, склонные к уязвимостям вроде сентиментальности".

traits.locale_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — and so do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
"Imperfect machines merit elimination — and so do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
"Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
"Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
"Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."
"Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

languages.text: “不完美的机器就应该被淘汰，那些容易多愁善感的生物也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: “不完美的机器就应该被淘汰，那些容易多愁善感的生物也同样如此。”

languages.text: «Las máquinas imperfectas merecen ser eliminadas, al igual que los elementos vivos propensos a vulnerabilidades como el sentimentalismo».
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: «Las máquinas imperfectas merecen ser eliminadas, al igual que los elementos vivos propensos a vulnerabilidades como el sentimentalismo».

languages.text: 「不完全な機械は排除すべきだ。生命体も同様、感傷的なものは脆弱になりやすい」
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: 「不完全な機械は排除すべきだ。生命体も同様、感傷的なものは脆弱になりやすい」

languages.text: "Nicht perfekte Maschinen müssen eliminiert werden – ebenso wie lebende Elemente, die für Schwächen wie Sentimentalität anfällig sind."
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht perfekte Maschinen müssen eliminiert werden – ebenso wie lebende Elemente, die für Schwächen wie Sentimentalität anfällig sind."

languages.text: « Les machines imparfaites doivent être éliminées... tout comme les êtres vivants sujets aux tares telles que le sentimentalisme. »
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: « Les machines imparfaites doivent être éliminées... tout comme les êtres vivants sujets aux tares telles que le sentimentalisme. »

languages.text: "Kusurlu makinelerin hakkı; duygusallık gibi kırılganlıklara yatkın canlı unsurlarla aynı kaderi paylaşmak, ortadan kaldırılmaktır."
languages.original_text: "Imperfect machines merit elimination — as do living elements prone to vulnerabilities such as sentimentality."

traits.locale_text: "Kusurlu makineler de duygusallık gibi kırılganlıklara yatkın canlı unsurlar gibi ortadan kaldırılmayı hak eder."
